subtask.title: Identify and Categorize Types of LLM Agents
subtask.objective: Compile a comprehensive list of different types of LLM agents and categorize them based on features, architecture, or use cases.
subtask.scope: Survey academic papers, industry reports, and existing classifications; create taxonomy of LLM agent types.

verification.completion_summary: The findings focus primarily on descriptions, challenges, and use cases of AI agents, especially in enterprise and coding contexts. While some classification insights are present, there is insufficient explicit categorization of LLM agent types based on features, architecture, or use cases, and no comprehensive taxonomy has been developed.

covered_aspects: Discussion of challenges in building and evaluating AI agents
Use cases in enterprise settings and coding tasks
Emerging trends like self-improving AI and automation
missing_aspects: Explicit identification and detailed categorization of different LLM agent types
Development of a taxonomy based on features, architecture, or use cases
Survey of academic papers and industry reports explicitly for classification

missing_requirements: Explicit taxonomy or classification of LLM agents
Clear differentiation based on features, architecture, or use cases
Surveyed and synthesized classifications from literature
